review: * *** ********* ********* ***** ******** **** ****** *** ** **** ***** ******* **** ** ** *** **** *** ********** * ******* ** **** * **** ** *****. Unfortunately, my experience was disappointing. The doctor spent no more than 5 to 7 minutes with me and lacked compassion throughout the consultation. Without listening to my full medical history, he hastily gave a diagnosis.Despite having a painful rash and repeatedly expressing my discomfort, *** ****** ****** ************ When I inquired about my mouth sores, his only advice was to "eat a good diet," which felt dismissive and unhelpful.** * ******* **** * ****** ** **** ** ******** * **** **** ** *** *** * ******* ****** ** ******** The lack of empathy and thoroughness in his approach left me feeling distressed and unheard.

*** ****** ** **** ********** ** ******* *** ******** ******** He asked to get tests done worth Rs 25,000 and then prescribed a simple antibiotic. That too did not cure the problem.  You should not spend your time and money on this doctor.

He should spent more time with patients. I visited for acute andcritical Hb deficiency but he didn't prescribed any medicine. I carried sufficient tests reports which was required for prescription. Disappointed to see repeated tests ...He is pushing more tests for ****** weight gain ...

Very bad experience. Will not recommend this Doc. The doc made me to spend 30k in Apollo hospital for tests including CT scan and visit other docs ************* and prescribe nothing for UTI infection. Very disappointing.
